entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 5:18 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers late in the morning and early afternoon then 30 percent chance of drizzle late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the morning and early afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:18 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
